item.description:
Welcome to Tunxis Plantation Golf Course and Banquet Facility!

Located in the scenic Farmington Valley, Tunxis Plantation is a 45 hole public golf course with two 18 hole courses and one 9 hole course.

Tunxis features an on-site grass tee driving range, large putting green and a restaurant which offers breakfast, lunch and dinner daily.

Directions:
From Interstate 84, take Exit 39. Go straight through the first traffic light heading west on Route 4. Pass through Farmington Center and over the Farmington River. Turn right at the light for Town Farm Road. Pro Shop is a mile down on the left.

Tee times are 10:30 and 10:38 on the red course.
item.name: Tunxis
